sections.title: Separator Style
sections.description:
Separators are like index cards at a library, to categorize Collections in your library.

To enable Separators for the Defaults Collections, select your style from the drop-down.

Warning: Plex does not officially support blank collections, which is what separators are. Select a Placeholder to be safe.

sections.title: Remove Overlays
sections.description: Remove Overlays will remove all overlays from your library. This toggle will take priority over any previous selections.

sections.title: Reset Overlays
sections.description:
Reset Overlays will grab a new base image from the source that you choose, and then use that as the source for applying your overlays.

Warning: Once you have done a run with Reset Overlays, you should then set this value to None or remove the reset_overlays line(s) from your config.yml. If you do not do this, you will end up in a loop of your overlays being removed, a new image grabbed, and your overlays reapplying.

sections.title: Assets for All
sections.description: Searches asset directories for images for all items in the library.

sections.title: Delete Collections
sections.description: Deletes collections based on a set of given attributes. The Collection must match all set attributes to be deleted.

toggles.label: Managed Collections
toggles.tooltip: When enabled: Only collections with the Kometa label (Managed) will be deleted.

toggles.label: Configured Collections
toggles.tooltip: When enabled: Only collections defined in the current config file will be eligible for deletion.

toggles.label: Ignore Empty Smart Collections
toggles.tooltip: When enabled: Excludes empty smart collections from being affected by the less item count check. This allows retaining things like smart collections that show movies without subtitles or the like.

number_input.label: Less Than (item count)
number_input.tooltip: Only collections with fewer than this number of items will be deleted. Optional value which if undefined means collections will be deleted regardless of how many items they have.

sections.title: Metadata Backup
sections.description: Backs up metadata to a YAML file. You can optionally set the path, exclude attributes, sync tag metadata, or add placeholders for items with no changes.

text_input.label: Backup File Path
text_input.tooltip: Optional. Leave blank to use default: <<library_name>>_Metadata_Backup.yml in your config folder.

custom_string_list.label: Exclude Attributes
custom_string_list.tooltip: List of attributes to exclude from the backup.

toggles.label: Sync Tag Attributes
toggles.tooltip: If enabled, all tag attributes will include the .sync option and add blank entries for syncing.

toggles.label: Add Blank Entries
toggles.tooltip: Adds a line for metadata attributes with no changes. Recommended for consistency.
